statements: SELECT * FROM prediction_data LIMIT 5
SELECT id, timestamp, label FROM prediction_data WHERE feature_1 > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT feature_1, feature_2, label FROM prediction_data WHERE feature_1 BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8
SELECT id, timestamp, label FROM prediction_data WHERE feature_1 < 0.3 LIMIT 10
SELECT feature_1, feature_2, label FROM prediction_data WHERE feature_2 >= 0.0 ORDER BY feature_1 ASC
SELECT * FROM prediction_data WHERE feature_1 > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, timestamp, label FROM prediction_data WHERE feature_2 < 0.3 ORDER BY id LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(label) AS max_label, MIN(label) AS min_label FROM prediction_data WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, feature_1, feature_2, label FROM prediction_data WHERE feature_1 < 0.4 AND feature_2 > 0.6 ORDER BY id DESC limit 5;
SELECT AVG(feature_1) AS avg_feature_1, AVG(feature_2) AS avg_feature_2 FROM prediction_data WHERE label < 0.5;
SELECT id, date, value FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT date, value FROM historical_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY value ASC
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT id, forecast_value FROM forecasting_data ORDER BY id LIMIT 5
SELECT id, forecast_value FROM forecasting_data WHERE forecast_value < 50
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM historical_data GROUP BY date HAVING MAX(value) > 500 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT date, value FROM historical_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM historical_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT hd.date, hd.value, fd.forecast_value FROM historical_data hd INNER JOIN forecasting_data fd ON hd.date = fd.date WHERE hd.value * 2 > fd.forecast_value ORDER BY hd.date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE id = 1
SELECT date, value FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT description FROM trends WHERE type = 'Upcoming' LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM forecasting WHERE forecast_id > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC
SELECT trend_id, forecast_date, forecast_value FROM forecasting WHERE forecast_value < 50
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE date = '2021-01-01' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, SUM(value) FROM historical_data GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(value) > 100;
SELECT trend_id, type, description FROM trends WHERE type = 'Upward';
SELECT * FROM historical_data JOIN forecasting ON historical_data.id = forecasting.trend_id WHERE date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT forecast_date, AVG(forecast_value) FROM forecasting GROUP BY forecast_date ORDER BY forecast_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_sales_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sales_amount, date FROM historical_sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_data WHERE email IS NULL;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_data WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM forecast_data ORDER BY predicted_sales ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_data WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT SUM(predicted_sales) AS total_sales FROM forecast_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT hd.id, hd.date, pd.product_name, cd.customer_name FROM historical_sales_data hd JOIN product_data pd ON hd.id = pd.product_id JOIN customer_data cd ON hd.id = cd.customer_id WHERE hd.sales_amount < 5000 ORDER BY hd.date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT historical_id, historical_date FROM historical_data WHERE historical_value > 100;
SELECT analysis_description FROM trends_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT ml_algorithm, ml_accuracy FROM machine_learning WHERE ml_accuracy >= 0.9;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_date, pattern_description FROM patterns_analysis WHERE pattern_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY historical_date DESC, historical_value ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT historical_date, AVG(historical_value) AS avg_value FROM historical_data GROUP BY historical_date;
SELECT historical_id, historical_date, historical_value FROM historical_data WHERE historical_date > '2022-01-01' AND historical_value > 100 ORDER BY historical_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, analysis_description FROM trends_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT ml_id, ml_algorithm, ml_accuracy FROM machine_learning WHERE ml_algorithm LIKE '%regression%' ORDER BY ml_accuracy DESC LIMIT 3;
